starterMessages.verification-help:
## Verification Support

**Having trouble verifying your Patreon subscription? We're here to help**

---

### Common Issues & Solutions

**1. Role Not Assigned After Verification**
‚Ä¢ Ensure your Patreon subscription is **active**
‚Ä¢ Try **disconnecting** and **reconnecting** in Linked Roles
‚Ä¢ Wait **1-2 minutes** for Discord to sync
‚Ä¢ Make sure you're using the **same email** for Patreon and Discord

**2. Can't Find Linked Roles**
‚Ä¢ Click **Server Name** (top-left) ‚Üí **Linked Roles**
‚Ä¢ Look for **Grizzly Gaming** in the connections list
‚Ä¢ Make sure you're in the **Grizzly Command Central** server

**3. OAuth Authorization Failed**
‚Ä¢ Clear your browser cache and try again
‚Ä¢ Make sure you're logged into the correct Discord account
‚Ä¢ Try using a different browser

**4. Wrong Tier Role Assigned**
‚Ä¢ Check your Patreon tier on https://patreon.com/grizzlygaming
‚Ä¢ Disconnect and reconnect via Linked Roles
‚Ä¢ Contact support if the issue persists

---

### Need Manual Assistance?

If none of the above solutions work, please provide:
1. Your **Patreon email address**
2. Your **Discord username**
3. Your **subscription tier** (Bronze/Silver/Gold)
4. **Screenshot** of your active Patreon subscription

Our support team will manually verify your account within 24 hours.

---

**Post your issue below and our support team will assist you**

# Support Ticket System

**Need help with Grizzly Bot? Open a support ticket below**

---

## How to Create a Ticket

Use the `/ticket-create` command:
```
/ticket-create
  title: Brief description of your issue
  description: Detailed explanation
  priority: low | medium | high | urgent
```

**Example:**
```
/ticket-create
  title: Bot not responding to commands
  description: Grizzly Bot doesn't respond when I use /server-status
  priority: medium
```

starterMessages.integration-guides:
# Integration Guides

**Tutorials for Grizzly Bot integrations**

---

## Nitrado DayZ Server

**Prerequisites:** Nitrado DayZ server, Grizzly Bot invited, active subscription

**1. Authenticate**
```
/nitrado-auth
```
Click OAuth link ‚Üí Log in ‚Üí Authorize ‚Üí Paste token

**2. Register Server**
```
/register-server service_id: [ID] server_name: [Name]
```

**3. Start Monitoring**
```
/start-monitoring
```
Real-time WebSocket, kill feeds, join/leave notifications

**4. Configure Channels**
```
/setup-channels
```
Creates #kill-feed, #player-stats, #server-status

---

## Patreon (Your Server)

**Prerequisites:** Patreon Creator account, Discord server, subscription

**1. Configure Roles**
```
/patreon-setup bronze_role: @Bronze silver_role: @Silver gold_role: @Gold
```

**2. Enable Verification**
```
/send-patreon-verification channel: #verify
```

**3. Test** - Member verifies ‚Üí Check role ‚Üí Monitor <#ticket-logs>

---

## Website Integration

**Coming Soon:** Web dashboard for server stats, leaderboards, tickets, analytics

---

## Works With Other Bots

‚Ä¢ **MEE6** - Grizzly (DayZ) + MEE6 (leveling)
‚Ä¢ **Carl-bot** - Grizzly (tickets) + Carl (roles)
‚Ä¢ **ProBot** - Grizzly (DayZ) + ProBot (stats)

---

## Troubleshooting

**Nitrado Auth Failed**
‚Ä¢ Check active services
‚Ä¢ Re-run `/nitrado-auth`
‚Ä¢ Verify token validity

**Monitoring Not Working**
‚Ä¢ `/list-services` to check
‚Ä¢ `/stop-monitoring` ‚Üí `/start-monitoring`
‚Ä¢ Verify bot permissions

**Patreon Issues**
‚Ä¢ Active subscription required
‚Ä¢ Role names must match
‚Ä¢ Bot needs "Manage Roles"

**Need help?** <#open-a-ticket>
